text:
FROM nginx:1.9.10
MAINTAINER Bench <dev@bench.co>

COPY ./target /app/
COPY ./.nginx-default.conf /etc/nginx/conf.d/default.conf

EXPOSE 8079
CMD nginx -g 'daemon off;'
author: Trevor O <trevor@trevoro.net>

text:
FROM nginx:latest
MAINTAINER Bench <dev@bench.co>

COPY ./target /app/
COPY ./.nginx-default.conf /etc/nginx/conf.d/default.conf

EXPOSE 80 8079
CMD nginx -g 'daemon off;'
author: Trevor O <trevor@trevoro.net>
message: we build locally and distribute remotely

text:
FROM node:0.12.9
MAINTAINER Bench <dev@bench.co>

# allow us to run npm and bower as root
RUN echo '{ "allow_root": true }' > /root/.bowerrc
RUN echo 'unsafe-perm = true' > /root/.npmrc

# caches npm install as a layer for faster builds
COPY package.json bower.json /app/
WORKDIR /app
RUN npm install --quiet

COPY . /app
WORKDIR /app
RUN npm run build
RUN chmod +x /app/docker_entry.sh

EXPOSE 80 8079

ENV RIND_ENV benchception

ENTRYPOINT /app/docker_entry.sh
author: Jean-Martin Archer <jm@bench.co>

text:
FROM node:0.12.9
MAINTAINER Bench <dev@bench.co>

# allow us to run npm and bower as root
RUN echo '{ "allow_root": true }' > /root/.bowerrc
RUN echo 'unsafe-perm = true' > /root/.npmrc

# caches npm install as a layer for faster builds
COPY package.json bower.json /app/
WORKDIR /app
RUN npm install --quiet

COPY . /app
WORKDIR /app
RUN npm run build

EXPOSE 80
author: Trevor O <trevor@trevoro.net>
